mapper.select: SELECT /* grpPgm.getGrpPgm */ GP.PGM_DT , GP.PGM_FM_TM , GP.PGM_TO_TM , GP.PGM_TP_CD , GP.MNG_USR_ID , GP.PGM_CTNT , GP.PGM_SESSION , GP.PGM_RST , GP.FILE_ID , GP.CRE_ID , GP.CRE_DT , GP.UPD_ID , GP.UPD_DT , GP.PGM_CD , SC01.CD_NM AS PGM_NM , SU.SITE_CD , SC02.CD_NM AS SITE_NM FROM GRP_PGM GP LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC01 ON (SC01.GRP_CD = 'C4500' AND SC01.CD_ID = GP.PGM_CD) LEFT JOIN SYS_USR SU ON (GP.MNG_USR_ID = SU.USR_ID) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC02 ON (SU.SITE_CD = SC02.CD_ID AND SC02.GRP_CD = 'C3500') WHERE GP.PGM_DT = #{pgmDt} AND GP.PGM_CD = #{pgmCd}
